title: Pork chops with fresh tomato, onion, garlic and feta
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 large onion, halved and thinly sliced', '4 pork chops, 2.5cm thick', 'salt to taste', 'black pepper to taste', 'garlic granules to taste', '1/2 punnet red cherry tomatoes, halved', '1/2 punnet yellow cherry tomatoes, halved', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '1 tablespoon dried basil', '2 1/2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '100g feta cheese, crumbled']
